scripts.cy:run: pnpm tui neovim prepare && concurrently --success command-cypress --kill-others --names 'app,cypress' --prefix-colors 'blue,yellow' 'pnpm tui start' 'wait-on --timeout 60000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 && npx cypress run --quiet'
scripts.dev: pnpm tui neovim prepare && concurrently --kill-others --names 'app,cypress' --prefix-colors 'blue,yellow' 'pnpm tui start' 'pnpm cy:open --e2e --browser=electron > /dev/null 2>&1'
